title: LF Plat + ADC MAIN
body:
Looking for an ADC main for my ranked 5s team. You will be 9th roster spot and we are an every day active team. Team currently filled with gold->master 

Always play on skype so that is necessary. The current team is in silver i will invite too but if youre good ill throw you on the gold team (normally same players)  So add me in game and let me know.

replies.body: Main is diamond 5 and this is my smurf, plat 1, (56LP) invite danklight vayne to your team and i'll gladly play whenever you need.
